theorem SciLean.kldiv_elbo {R : Type u_1} [SciLean.RealScalar R] {X : Type} {Z : Type} [MeasureTheory.MeasureSpace Z] [MeasureTheory.MeasureSpace X] (P : SciLean.Rand (Z √ó X)) (Q : SciLean.Rand Z) (x : X) : SciLean.KLDiv Q (SciLean.Rand.conditionSnd P x) =
